attributes.action: Make it a lifetime ban from all competitions for use of PEDs/doping in sport
attributes.background: Doping is rife in sport at all levels. It devalues the efforts of clean athletes, devalues the experience of supporters and above all devalues sport as a vessel to encourage hard work, playing by the rules and sportsmanship.

rejection.details: The issue you raise is a matter for the governing bodies of the sports concerned.
